title: Silca makes your chain faster with diamonds, polished & waxed you’ll be the fastest!
content:
Silca tells us what’s faster than their Secret Blend waxed chains… it’s apparently a chain polished for three days straight with diamonds before it gets the Secret Blend wax treatment. New Silca Diamond Polished & Waxed Chain kits are now being offered for every major road, gravel & mountain bike drivetrain, promising an instantaneous drag […]

The post Silca makes your chain faster with diamonds, polished & waxed you’ll be the fastest! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
